Join Our Team

Want to join one of the fastest-growing business process outsourcing (BPO) companies? A company that encourages work from home options? A fast rising call center? Apply to TeleDirect today!

As a company focused on our staff, we have developed a culture of drive and individual responsibility through a knowledgeable and diverse workforce. TeleDirect is an equal opportunity employer and welcome employees who meet the requirements of the job, regardless of gender, ethnic origin, disability, age, religion or sexual orientation for our call center. Apply today!

The TeleDirect Story

Over 20 years ago, we started as a small company in a crowded field of competitors. We quickly established TeleDirect as a name to be reckoned with, thanks to our passion for exceptional service, quality outsourced solutions and a total commitment to quality & integrity at all times.

Today, TeleDirect is one of the most trusted names in outsourced excellence. From our world-class inbound & outbound call center services to our highly adaptable, intelligent call center platform and more, TeleDirect provides every customer the same attention to detail and urgency they apply to other areas of the businesses.

The TeleDirect secret? We take the hassle and stress out of managing client communication, call center activities, reservations and more. And it all starts with our talented staff. We’re looking for the best customer service reps, call center agents, engineers and more. Enjoy all the advantages of working at TeleDirect. Work from home, with a flexible schedule that encourages optimal work-life balance.

Be A Part of Our Success

TeleDirect is committed to innovation and employee development, having a variety of positions which offer many interesting job opportunities for prospective employees. We try to promote internally from within and encourage all our employees to achieve their full career potentiaL And with TeleDirect’s work from home opportunities, you’ll enjoy the freedom and flexibility of a schedule that actually works in your favor! TeleDirect is proud of our low levels of labor turnover and the high degree of personal loyalty which our employees demonstrate.

How to Apply

How to Apply for TeleDirect Jobs

We are currently hiring for multiple positions including Inbound and Outbound Agents within our multi-channel environment to assist clients with their phone, text and email campaigns.

TeleDirect jobs: Additional positions and advancement opportunities are available for Supervisory staff (including tele jobs from home), Quality Assurance Evaluators and Team Leaders. TeleDirect’s work from home flexibility is hard to beat - get your application in ASAP!

We’re looking for talented professionals for our call center. Apply today! Please complete the following link to begin the application process:

APPLY NOW - REMOTE

If you have any questions about the application process, please call our Recruiting Department at 916-345-2858. You can also send an email to remoterecruiting@teledirect.com and our recruiting team will respond to you as soon as possible.

Thanks for considering TeleDirect for employment. We look forward to viewing your application soon!
